title.tags-mediaembed: The following Amazon sites are currently not supported for MediaEmbed, so will always display as plain links (obeying the settings above): CN, BR, MX, AU

field.keep-existing-tag: Keep Amazon Affiliate Tags from original links instead of replacing
field.keep-existing-tag-help: By default any existing tag in the original url is replaced by the tag you define below.
field.help-mediaembed: When used inconjunction with fof/formatting, the rich embed will always remove any existing tags
field.remove-tag-if-unhandled: Remove Amazon Affiliate Tags on Amazon links that aren't covered
field.remove-tag-if-unhandled-help: By default links that aren't covered are left as-it, including their tag if any.
field.tag-placeholder: Leave empty to not cover those links
